page.title: 10A Day out from Crowthorne
page.content:
A Saturday Out
After getting up and breakfasting at 10 a.m. we packed a lunch and got ready to go out.
At 11.15 we went swimming at Bracknell. We stayed for about 3/4 hour. Then we went to Virginia Water where we had a picnic at 1 o'clock.
After lunch we had an ice cream and walked round the lake and gardens. After a rest we walked back to the car. By that time it was about 5 p.m. so we sat dangling our feet in the water eating another ice cream.
It was then time to return home for tea.We spent the evening watching T.V.
